page.title: 15Hercules the Bear.
page.content: For anyone with an interest in animals,Leven is an ideal holiday centre.As well as the resident four- legged attractions(like retired racehorse,Big Ginger)at Letham Glen and Silverburn,there are occasional appearances by celebrity animals such as Glen Michael's terrier Rusty. By far the best known animal star to visit Leven,however,is Hercules the Bear.A European brown bear,he will be at Letham Glen from the 9th of June and will be there every Tuesday until the 20th of August.He will join in teddy bears parades and he will be wrestling with his owner Andy Robins. Hercules weighs just over half a ton. His favourite food is baked beans. Believe it or not, he is frightened of caterpillars_Big Softy!
